label: ham
subject: RE: pass variable to another program
body: 57 (return) [ He sometimes expressed a sentence of death with a tone of pleasantry: ÒAbi, Comes, et muta ei caput, qui sibi mutari provinciam cupit.Ó A boy, who had slipped too hastily a Spartan bound; an armorer, who had made a polished cuirass that wanted some grains of the legitimate weight, &c., were the victims of his fury.]
